official-title.#text:
To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the tariff preference level
			 on imports of certain cotton and man-made fiber, fabric, apparel, and
			 made-up goods from Bahrain under the United States-Bahrain Free Trade
			 Agreement.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

header.#text:
Extension of tariff preference level on imports of certain cotton and man-made fiber, fabric,
			 apparel, and made-up goods from Bahrain under the United States-Bahrain
			 Free Trade Agreement

text.#text:
U.S. Note 13 to subchapter XIV of chapter 99 of the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States
			 is amended—
in the matter preceding paragraph (a), by striking
in the matter following paragraph (d), by striking

The amendments made by this section shall apply with respect to articles entered, or withdrawn from
			 warehouse for consumption, on or after January 1, 2016.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 4955 IH: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the tariff preference level on imports of certain cotton and man-made fiber, fabric, apparel, and made-up goods from Bahrain under the United States-Bahrain Free Trade Agreement.
